title: Convert a : Gdk.Pixbuf <-> SKImage/SKSurfafe/SKBitmap/SKPicture for Gtk
body:
This exists in Gtk's  `SKWidget.OnExposeEvent()`:

https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/blob/master/source/SkiaSharp.Views/SkiaSharp.Views.Gtk/SKWidget.cs#L36

And it's a nice way to translate an SKSurface's drawing into a `Gdk.Pixbuf` object.  Though, there are some cases where It would be nice to paint an `Gdk.Pixbuf` onto an `SKSurface`.  Some conversion functions would be nice.

> VS bug [#736298](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/736298)
